attributes.action: introduce proportional representation  for general elections to ensure ALL votes count
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the current voting system only a minority of constituencies are targeted by electoral parties. Those considered 'safe' seats are ignored by the main parties. PR would encourage people to vote as can be seen in other countries and the resulting government would represent a true image of the voters wishes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
